note: Container for all element metadata
The label/name of the element, e.g. 'has manifestation statement'
Full definition of the element, e.g. 'Relates a manifestation to a statement that appears in a manifestation to represent aspects of itself.'
Additional information about the element's scope and usage
The domain of the element (what type of resource it applies to)
The range of the element (what type of value it can take)
References to more specific elements that are sub-types of this element
References to more general elements that are super-types of this element
The URI identifier of the element, e.g. 'http://iflastandards.info/ns/isbd/isbdm/elements/1025'
The type of RDF property ('DatatypeProperty' for literal values, 'ObjectProperty' for resource values)
URIs of properties that this property is a sub-property of
URIs of properties that are equivalent to this property
URIs of properties that are inverse of this property
The publication status of the element
The namespace that defines this element
Boolean flag indicating if the element is deprecated
Version in which the element was deprecated
Version in which the element will be removed
URI of the sub-type element
Relative URL to the sub-type element's documentation
Label of the sub-type element
URI of the super-type element
Relative URL to the super-type element's documentation
Label of the super-type element
